_directives.name: skip
_directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if` argument is true.

_directives.name: include
_directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true.

_directives.name: deprecated
_directives.description: Marks an element of a GraphQL schema as no longer supported.

args.name: reason
args.description: Explains why this element was deprecated, usually also including a suggestion for how to access supported similar data. Formatted using the Markdown syntax, as specified by [CommonMark](https://commonmark.org/).

_directives.name: specifiedBy
_directives.description: Exposes a URL that specifies the behaviour of this scalar.

args.name: url
args.description: The URL that specifies the behaviour of this scalar.
